text: Gruia Novac was a water polo player from Romania. Novac competed at the 1964 Summer Olympics and the 1972 Summer Olympics. He was born on 24 January 1944 and died in 1999.Gruia Novac == References == Category:1944 births Category:1999 deaths Category:Romanian water polo players Category:Olympians for Romania Category:Sportspeople from Bucharest
title: Gruia Novac
